digest_items.title: Implement security awareness training
digest_items.why: Human error is the leading cause of security incidents
digest_items.fix: Conduct quarterly phishing simulations and security training

digest_items.title: Enable database encryption at rest
digest_items.why: Unencrypted databases are vulnerable if storage media is compromised
digest_items.fix: Enable Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) or equivalent for your database

digest_items.title: Use security linters in CI/CD
digest_items.why: Automated security checks catch vulnerabilities before deployment
digest_items.fix: Integrate tools like Bandit (Python), ESLint security plugin (JS)

digest_items.title: Use parameterized queries
digest_items.why: Parameterized queries prevent SQL injection attacks
digest_items.fix: Never concatenate user input into SQL; use prepared statements instead

digest_items.title: Verify SSL certificate validity
digest_items.why: Expired certificates break HTTPS and expose users to MITM attacks
digest_items.fix: Set up automated renewal with Let's Encrypt or monitor expiry dates

digest_items.title: Implement input validation
digest_items.why: Unvalidated input leads to injection attacks and data corruption
digest_items.fix: Validate all user input on both client and server side
